Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Correctly working ICO accounting, exchange rates and a few more features ‚Äì that‚Äôs what we have done in the last 2 weeks.  What‚Äôs new üçï  1. We have completely redrafted the accounting of transactions ‚ÄúParticipation in the ICO‚Äù. It is possible to indicate the currency and purchase rate or you can simply add (for accounting of bounty, airdrop). Specify the full name of the token and the symbol, and when the coin enters the exchange and appears in CoinMarketCap, you can edit the transaction and select the appropriate coin. After that, the token and transaction are converted and you can easily see your profitability.  2. Have finished import from Binance. Now add several keys to one or different portfolios.  3. The exchange rate chart has been updated. Now you can see historical currency prices for the whole period (for example, when bitcoin cost 5 cents) in the tab ‚Äúrate‚Äù. The performance and accuracy of the chart have  also been increased.  4. Have added a page with charts, data on the rates and market capitalization of the TOP-100 cryptocurrency: https://beta.fintab.io/marketcap   Fixes ‚öôÔ∏è  Thank you for your feedback! In this sprint we have corrected the mistakes that you are helping us to find.  1. Have fixed errors with historical exchange rates for currencies: SONM, XRP, HMQ, TRST, IOT, BAT.  2. Have fixed an error in ‚ÄúBuy and Sell‚Äù, when the user does not specify the purchase rate but selects the current date.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: June news  It is summer outside, and we did not notice that we have fixed old bugs, have updated the service, have moved to a new office and began to expand the team. But first things first.  What's new in the service? - Login and register via Facebook. - An updated chart with the ability to select any time interval. - The long-awaited Android update: the ability to sign in to the application without registration and authorization. - In the iOS app, the exchange and currency screen were added.  What was corrected? - Fixed some errors in calculating ROI. - Removed duplicate currencies. - Corrected the rates of some currencies.  How is marketing doing? - We are actively working on the blog, you can read different articles. - Started promotion on LinkedIn. Official page https://www.linkedin.com/company/fintab-io - Mobile application installations have doubled in comparison with the previous month.  Team We are expanding. This month we hired: - New Internet-marketer; - Programmer; - Several copywriters; - A new translator.  We use scrum to manage our work; according to it there are temporary frames - sprints. Every two weeks we review the past sprint and plan the next one. This time we have reviewed the results and planned new things in a new office, which we moved to the other day.  We are reviewing the sprint. The results are written on the board: what is good and what can be improved  This is how our new office looks. Soon we will order pizzas here on Fridays.  What will happen in the near future? - Money withdrawal. - New more detailed quick chart. - Updated payment page design. - Unmistakable import of transactions from Binance.[/size]

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Sign up with Facebook    Recently FinTab‚Äôs registration has become even easier. Register via Facebook and track your portfolio.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: We have a lot of news  Earlier we have already said that every two weeks we conduct a sprint review. Yesterday we discussed the outcomes of our work and want to share them with you:   Service ‚Äì Updated the architecture of the service‚Äôs database: the speed of loading charts on the Dashboard for large portfolios is 0.5-1.5 seconds now instead of 30-50 seconds! ‚Äì Significantly accelerated transactions import via API Binance (to 5 minutes instead of 50). ‚Äì Added a withdrawal operation. ‚Äì Added the ability to account for commision when adding transactions.   Fixes ‚Äì Together with the architecture update, we eliminate a lot of duplicate currencies and corrected rates for some currencies. ‚Äì Corrected the error of mixed-up rate while importing transactions from Binance ‚Äì Now the chart on the currency page is built only on the transactions of this currency. ‚Äì Fixed some bugs and increased productivity for Android. ‚Äì Made the login and registration for Android even more convenient.   Marketing ‚Äì Every day we add new articles to the blog. There are a lot of interesting things. ‚Äì The number of site visits and application‚Äôs installations has grown 1.5 times compared to the previous sprint ‚Äì By the beginning of July, a big PR company will be launched to promote tokens. We plan to conduct InvestBox. ‚Äì We are updating our YouTube and preparing some videos for our channel. We recommend you to subscribe to it. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCm89wIR7aKi1sjexivd1Eeg?sub_confirmation=1

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Happy Birthday FinTab!   This day twelvemonth ago ‚Äúwe met in the office, discussed everything and started to create cryptocurrency portfolio tracker together with preparation to the ICO‚Äù. During this year we:  Service ‚Ä¢  Have written a big number of lines of code ‚Ä¢  Have grown up from a usual Google table to a fully-fledged system.  Token ‚Ä¢  Have appeared on the  ForkDelta, EtherDelta, YoBit exchanges. ‚Ä¢  We will launch InvestBox on YoBit exchange soon.  Mobile app ‚Ä¢  Have developed a mobile app, which brings 80% of active users to FinTab.  Marketing ‚Ä¢  Have not been afraid of speaking about ourselves and writing of big texts with numbers. ‚Ä¢  Have been published in media. ‚Ä¢  Have visited conferences and spoken in public ‚Ä¢  Have answered users 24/7.  Team ‚Ä¢  Have expanded from three people up to twelve. ‚Ä¢  Have moved to a new office. ‚Ä¢  Many pizzas have been eaten up. ‚Ä¢  All team has done so many pull-ups as many funds have been raised through ICO.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: More than 80% of crypto traders do not have trading experience on exchanges  The social network for investors eToro conducted a study and found out that most crypto traders do not have previous trading experience on exchanges.   Mostly crypto traders are young people between 20 and 27 years old, students, IT people or unemployed. The vast majority do not have any investment experience: 81.96% of them are ‚Äúbeginners‚Äù, 10.66% have an ‚Äúaverage level‚Äù and only 7.38% can be called ‚Äúadvanced‚Äù users.    In the Medium blog of COO FinTab Grigory Maltsev there are some excellent articles that will help you to become better and to join 7.38% ‚Äúadvanced‚Äù users. One of these is the ‚ÄúBasics of creating a cryptocurrency portfolio‚Äù. And you can start tracking your crypto portfolio in our system https://goo.gl/eV9JFX

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: News digest May, 6 ‚Äì May, 18   Every two weeks, we are reviewing the objectives.  Development  What's new in the service? 1. Log in and register with a Google Account. 2. The ability to add an email to the account registered with login. 3. Small improvements of the ability to reset the password: now a user receives an email with the link, that lets the user entering his / her new password. We no longer generate the password automatically.   What is corrected?   1.The transaction profit is displayed in the selected currency of portfolio. 2.Bitcoin is always valued against the dollar in the list of currencies on the dashboard. 3.We fixed the error with the NANO currency rate. 4.The MTL currency is now correctly defined.  Marketing   Mobile application Over the past two weeks, a number of our mobile application installations has grown threefold compared to the previous month. Do not forget to install FinTab on your phone   iOS RU https://goo.gl/rFkZRu iOS EN https://itunes.apple.com/app/fintab-crypto-portfolio/id1349747379 Google Play RU https://goo.gl/Jy3Nvp Google Play EN https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.fintab.fintab&hl=en   Blog Yes, we have a blog, where we have made a compilation of 20 useful Telegram channels for crypto traders, which we read ourselves and advise you https://fintab.io/blog/20-useful-telegram-channels-for-crypto-trading/     If you know how to write strong articles about cryptocurrency ‚Äì shoot an email to us on market@fintab.io we look forward to collaborating.   By the way, we got a new logo!

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Why do governments prohibit Bitcoin?  Being engaged in cryptocurrency is a walk on thin, unexplored ice. Recently, the State Duma of the Russian Federation has reviewed a draft law "On Digital Financial Assets" and adopted almost unanimously. http://duma.gov.ru/news/27027/  Some interesting ideas, such as tax incentives, have been discussed already during the parliamentary discussions. In the blog of COO FinTab, Grigory Maltsev, you can read about how the participants of the crypto industry work in the Russian Federation https://goo.gl/GtjfW8 (Russian translation https://goo.gl/YqXb1f)  In the new article, we figured out why the governments of many countries prohibit Bitcoin and what the possible consequences are. https://fintab.io/blog/why-do-governments-prohibit-bitcoin/

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: I am engaged in (pyramids) crypto-currencies and I try to hide it from people  Many crypto-community participants are hiding their activities. We learned from our colleagues why they do not like to talk about their work and about the stereotypes that they have faced while working on the projects.  From this article you will learn: - Why Paymon CEO, Semen Gleim tries not to talk about his work. - Who invited the President of the Ural Blockchain Association, Anton Ryabin to the Russian Bath Academy. - How MicroMoney co-founder, Anton Dzyadkovsky supports the crypto-community. - Cryptex Capital CEO Nikita Kutsenko will tell you how to organize your work if you have to take large amounts of clients under management. - Who acts like messiah in crypto-economics according to Dararius CMO Ruslan Vasutin. - Why everything leads to cryptomarxism, according to Ilya Orlov, Travel Chain CEO. - What the representatives of the network AirBitClub think about crypto-currencies. - What to do with negative public opinion.  And more interesting things. Follow the link, enjoy the reading and do not forget to ‚Äúclap‚Äù at the end.   https://goo.gl/rjZgVn

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: The long-awaited event! All tokens have been successfully sent.   Now you need to check your wallets for FNTB tokens. If there were any problems with the accrual, please write to m@fintab.io   As we said earlier, FNTB tokens are sent to those wallets, where FNT tokens are. If you have lost access to your wallet, you stole it or it is a wallet that does not accept tokens (for example, the exchange) - we unfortunately can‚Äôt recover your funds, block your account or transfer tokens for a new one.   We are often asked the question ‚ÄúWhere can I see how many tokens I received?‚Äù  The best platform to check tokens is Etherscan: https://etherscan.io/ In the search box, you need to enter the address of your wallet and press the GO button. Or open the link: https://etherscan.io/address/a–¥pec –∫o—àe–ª—å–∫a#tokentxns replacing the "wallet address" with the address of your ETH wallet.   We remind you how to add FNTB to your Ethereum wallet on MyEtherWallet: 1. Go to the wallet website. 2. Enter the wallet through Private Key or Keystore File (UTC / JSON) or in another convenient way. 3. Under the transaction history, find the "Token balances" block. 4. Choose "Add your own token". 5. Fill in the data: a)   address of the smart contract token 0xbD4B60a138b3fce3584EA01f50c0908c18f9677A b)   name - FNTB c)    decimals - 8   FNTB token is coming soon on the exchanges. Follow the news so you will not miss out on where we'll be listed the first!

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Hooray! Finally, it happened! The trades started on the exchange for FinTab Service. EtherDelta is the first trading platform where you will see FNTB tokens.   Available trading pairs: FNTB (FinTab) / ETH   EtherDelta is a decentralized platform for trading ERC20 tokens. It was launched in the summer of 2017 by Zack Coburn, who had already initiated successful projects before, one of them was FirstBlood. The exchange is in demand because of low commissions to replenish the account and withdraw funds, a large number of coins, and most importantly security, since the trade is decentralized, from the wallet to the wallet and do not enter the single centre.     [Important!] How to find the FNTB token on EtherDelta? As mentioned above, EtherDelta is a decentralized exchange, which allows you to trade even before the official listing by the management of the exchange. This means: while your application is being processed, you can already buy / sell tokens on the exchange. To do this, you need to click the link: https://etherdelta.com/#0xbd4b60a138b3fce3584ea01f50c0908c18f9677a-ETH     Add this address to the bookmarks so you will not lose it. After the official listing, all orders will be saved, just the address will be changed to short and there will be an opportunity to select a token from the list of all tokens.   Attention! Beware of scammers. To verify this is a valid address (actual before the official listing):   1. https://etherdelta.com/#0xbd4b60a138b3fce3584ea01f50c0908c18f9677a-ETH In the link after etherdelta.com/# there is the address of our smart contract. 0xbD4B60a138b3fce3584EA01f50c0908c18f9677A  2. You can manually go to our token page:   a.       Choose the "Other" in the token list http://take.ms/NtzZO b.       Enter the data (you can specify the coin name FNTB or FinTab) and click "Go" http://take.ms/Ro6ZG    How to trade on EtherDelta, do input and output means, there is a lot of information on the Internet. Due to the heavy workload, we will not be able to answer these questions. As an example, we can recommend to study these materials (prepared by EtherDelta. FinTab is not responsible for them and the possible misunderstanding):     https://youtu.be/gb34BYTg5F8 https://www.reddit.com/r/EtherDelta/comments/6hrxjw/etherdelta_guides_for_first_time_users/   We also negotiate with the other exchanges and continue to develop our service.   Follow our news and you will find out where else you can buy or sell FinTab tokens.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: We have actively worked on improving the FinTab service and we are ready to announce several important updates.  Now the historical rate according to your assets is taken from the exchange you specified, not on the average market rate as before. We completely revised the page ‚Äúexchanges and currencies‚Äù, added new graphics and made it more informative. Now users have the opportunity to check the yield on each exchange and the yield on each currency within a certain exchange separately. We start downloading the hourly historical exchange rate. Now you can indicate the purchase rate only by days, after the download is complete, it will be possible to do this accurate to one hour.  We keep on developing the project and do not stop there! Follow the news of the project in our social networks. I remind you that our token is already traded on the EtherDelta exchange:    https://etherdelta.com/#0xbd4b60a138b3fce3584ea01f50c0908c18f9677a-ETH

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Good news for investors ICO FinTab!  The FNTB token is already on the ETHERDELTA exchange (https://goo.gl/pLvHQP) and soon the number of exchanges will be increased. We are often asked why we do not plan to be listed on such exchanges as Binance, Bittrex and others from the ‚Äútop ten‚Äù? Placing on such exchanges is incredibly expensive (from 200,000 to 1,500,000 dollars) and within the framework of our project it is impossible. But there are other very good and popular exchanges on which we can afford to make a listing.   One of such exchanges is Liqui. This is a very promising exchange, which we will describe in details when we get the official listing. Now our team is negotiating with the management of the exchange on the terms of the listing. With regard to the holidays now in Asia, the queue for listing has formed on the stock exchange, and we are waiting for a positive decision about the placement.   Follow the news of the project in our social networks to be aware of all important events.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: FinTab is a service for financial accounting of cryptocurrency, now a mobile application is available on Android.   We will add new functions and features step by step, and soon the application will have the same capabilities and functionality as a web service.   In the previous version there were a lot of bugs, now we are working on fixing them and we are updating the design. For a while, only the dashboard and authorization without registration will be available in the application, so use the basic web version, and the application will allow you to easily track changes in your portfolio. In the next update, we will add registration and the option to add transactions.   The decision to gradually launch the application had been prompted by the fact that we want to take into account all previous mistakes and bugs, as well as your suggestions and comments, and make our application even better and more convenient for you.   You can download the application from this link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.fintab.fintab

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: The upcoming week plan.  FinTab starts a new week meeting the pressing challenges. This week we:  1. Release the iOS app! 2. Format the output of digits for convenience of perception. 3. Plan to make ROI, Profit / Loss by a specific currency and the exchange for different time intervals (1 month/7 days/24 hours). 4. For each transaction, we will display the purchase rate. 5. Optimize caching ‚Äì this will speed up page loading and charts  Did we miss anything? Throw some work our way in the comments.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Top news for February, 2  In the last few days we were so busy that there was absolutely no time to tell you about what we have done:     ‚Ä¢ We have addressed all the issues of the tokens‚Äô accrual.    ‚Ä¢ We have calculated all payments for the Bounty program.    ‚Ä¢ We have calculated the bonus payments for reviews about FinTab.  These tasks turned out to be more labor-intensive than we expected, since the total number of ICO participants was more than 1000 people! And an equal number in the Bounty program.  To date, we have prepared everything for the final tokens‚Äô sending for the Bounty program, which will be held on 2-3 February.  After this, on February 3-5, we will be able to burn all unused tokens.  At the moment we are finishing the drafting of a new smart contract: we have done an audit and clarify some details. The new contract deploy will be held immediately after unused tokens‚Äô burning. The new contract will issue the exact number of tokens, which will be automatically sent to all FNT holders:     ‚Ä¢ A new smart contract will issue FNTB and send them to those wallets that hold FNT.    ‚Ä¢ You all will have 2 tokens ‚Äì FNT and FNTB.    ‚Ä¢ No need to return FNT.    ‚Ä¢ Only FNTB will be traded on the exchanges.    ‚Ä¢ FNT will remain as a souvenir  Follow our news to find out the exact dates of entering the exchanges.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Breaking news for February 5         At the moment, we have completed sending the tokens: to all the ICO members, the bounty and the team. The total number of tokens was: 3,079,386.683 FNT.  Today we are planning to deploy a new smart contract. In the new contract there will be an exact number of tokens (if we do not have time to burn the old tokens in the old contract, then we will not take them into account). If everything goes well, tomorrow everyone will be credited with FNTB, and we will make a primary listing on stock exchanges.       Exchanges that we are planning to enter:      - EtherDelta      - IDEX      - Liqui Trade      - YObit      - LiveCoin      - EXMO   More answers to frequently asked questions can be found here https://fintab.io/faq/  ‚Äì the page receives regular additions and updates.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: We applied to the exchanges and deployed the new Smart Contract   Great news: we deployed the new smart contract! Contract address: 0xbD4B60a138b3fce3584EA01f50c0908c18f9677A https://etherscan.io/address/0xbd4b60a138b3fce3584ea01f50c0908c18f9677a   The total number of tokens was: 3,079,386.683 FNTB.   Yesterday we launched a script to send tokens. We need to make about 1000 transactions. If you have not yet received FNTB tokens, do not worry, sending tokens is in the process and it requires some time. We kindly ask you to wait.   [Important!] While we are sending new FNTB tokens, you do not need to do anything with the old FNT tokens.   Now we are actively engaged in a dialogue with exchanges and soon you will see our token there.    Frequently asked questions  The team tokens will be on these addresses: 0x4498cD55bcBba8ef81D5FA7a3F10744c44d3ae83 0x5946cFa64a3CDF53B202ecF8fD4422b8361F0251 0xeEdE9254e06708f47d1Fcb959dD6D38FdfAC2adb   They will be frozen until July 1. You can check on the address of the smart contract.    How to add FNTB to your Ethereum wallet on MyEtherWallet  1. Go to your Wallet, in our case it‚Äôs MyEthereumWallet. 2. Enter the Wallet using your Private Key or Keystore File (UTC / JSON) or in another convenient way. 3. Under the transaction history, find the ‚ÄúToken balances‚Äù block. 4. Choose ‚ÄúAdd your Token‚Äù. 5. Fill in the data: a. address = 0x9D613a7A10CD550C7a0826c6deEcFF6f1B3e9879 b. name = FNT c. decimals = 8.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: FinTab ICO is Over   We are glad to inform you that the FinTab  ICO has successfully came to an end and most importantly, we have collected the necessary amount for the implementation of the project. At the moment we are processing full statistics obtained during the ICO and preparing a report on the work done which we will publish in a few days.   Our basic principle is to make the service for people but without your support, we would never have achieved such results. We hope that together will reach new heights.   Thank you all for your support and enthusiasm!  Just in case we remind you again, that after the ICO we will conduct additional accruals for the Bounty program. Check carefully whether all tokens have been accrued correctly. If something was not taken into account, it is necessary to report this until January, 31 20:00 UTC. After that we will be unable to make changes, because all unreleased tokens will be burnt and the new contract will be created. For all questions, please contact m@fintab

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Recently, we were often asked the question: "Will you do the system of analytics and the advertising platform with the current amount of raised funds?"  We noticed that many FinTab users were interested in these features of the service.  According to our plan to implement the system of analytics and signals, it is necessary to collect at least $ 500K, for advertising functionality - $ 1M. Thus, we will not be able to fully implement these tools (unless we do not collect another $ 550,000 for the remaining days)  But there is good news! Even with the current amount of investment, we plan to implement these opportunities in our service, but it will be in a slightly simplified version. Despite the fact that we will simplify implementation a little - it should turn out cool. Moreover, our project is a working business model, which implies continuous improvement and new opportunities implementation.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: We want the interaction to be not only between us and users but also between users themselves. Nowadays information is one of the most valuable resources. Therefore, we implement function that allows traders to sell information about their cryptoportfolios through our system. In this case FinTab system acts as a communication platform. Additionally, we will make a sophisticated evaluation system that will form the rating of traders, so that the users can get really useful information.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Recently we published information that we will reissue our token, and many investors asked us about how the new FNTB tokens will be accrued.     FNTB will be accrued to all holders of FNT in the ratio 1: 1  It does not matter:   1. where FNT was purchased or received 2. whether they were transferred to another wallet 3. on how many wallets they are stored 4. when they were bought or received   FNTB tokens will be automatically added to all wallets, where you have FNT, in the ratio 1:1. So you do not worry, no actions are required from you to get FNTB tokens.   We remind you that now we launched a system of bonuses for investors. You have the opportunity to get 50 FNT + 10% of the tokens you bought for publishing posts about FinTab on your pages in social networks.   Bonuses for feedback will be added after ICO completion in FNT. Read more (https://steemit.com/fintab/@fintab/new-bonus-from-fintab)  To participate in the bonus program, you must fill out this form: https://goo.gl/nQwr4d

Author: fintab_bounty
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Hi. Private investors don't need an overloaded system which is more difficult for understanding than cryptocurrencies. For traders the maximum automation is required not to waste their time on accounting and analytics. Traders make transactions on various exchanges (because of the rate difference) and financial accounting becomes a very laborious task. For funds it is needed to reduce the routine processing of huge transaction flows from their customers. It is important to decrease the complexity of maintaining internal accounting and improve its accuracy. And for clients as for investors the most important thing is to understand how much they have earned.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Today our CEO Michael decided to tell you the story  An interesting example of using our service:   ‚ÄúLike many holders of crypto-currency, I kept my savings on several exchanges. In my portfolio I have 42 crypto-currencies, which I actively trade.   Last summer BTC-e exchange suddenly closed and many people lost their savings and all the information about them. P.S. The exchange was reopened with the new name Wex.   I asked friends who also kept their savings on BTC-e: ‚ÄúHow much did you lose?‚Äù And it turned out people could not even determine how much and which currency they kept on this exchange.   That time I was already using the beta-version of FinTab service. I went to the website and went through all the transactions on the exchange and saw the exact amount of the crypto currency at BTC-e. A week later, I could see how much this or that coin grew and assess its losses in accordance with the current exchange rate.   Such situations can occur at any time. It is usual practice when the exchange does not work for a With the help of FinTab service, you can check the current balance any time without entering to the exchange.‚Äù

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Legal audit  As we mentioned earlier, transparency and legality of FinTab's activities are our main priorities. Therefore, preparing for the new market entering and listing on the stock exchanges, we carried out a full legal audit. Upon the audit completion, we got a positive evaluation, and now we can confidently say that FinTab ICO meets all necessary legal requirements.   Important to know: ‚Ä¢ FNT and FNTB token are fully utility tokens. ‚Ä¢ White Paper is legally sound. ‚Ä¢ FinTab has a legal entity under the jurisdiction of the Republic of Cyprus.     Thus, we can conclude that we do not have any formal restrictions for listing the token on exchanges and that citizens of all countries can use our tokens, except for those where the ICO is prohibited.   If you have not yet read our Token Sale Agreement, you can do so by clicking on the link:   https://docs.google.com/document/d/1J9IH76V5ROTQ04mPqWqJHK4V_TgLJ1vSEPJt018HKjA/edit

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: We are often asked: ‚ÄúDo you have a legal entity?‚Äù  Transparency and legality of FinTab activities are our main priorities. Therefore, during these New Year holidays we have established an incorporated legal entity. We decided to choose the Republic of Cyprus as a jurisdiction.   From this moment we are ready to be legally responsible for our actions and most importantly, now we can have official contractual relations with our partners. First of all, this will give the funds an opportunity to fully cooperate with us.   The name and the address of our legal entity: BADIAREN MANAGEMENT LTD (25B, st. TRIPOLITSAS, LIMASSOL, 3086, CYPRUS)

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Integration with the Bancor Protocol  We are working on a new smart contract (the announcement of the new about the smart contract improvement ) and we plan to implement the Bancor Protocol. Bancor Protocol is a promising technology that turns any token into a ‚Äúsmart-token‚Äù that will automatically without any additional actions from the author traded or exchanged for any smart-token.   How is works  A smart token contains one or more other tokens that form a ‚Äúreserve‚Äù, which allows anyone in real time to buy a smart token in exchange for any of their backup tokens, according to a special formula that balances the volumes. The percentage of reserve that the author chooses is called Constant Reserve Ratio (CRR). The reserve currency can be any ERC-20 token. In our case, we plan to use the Bancor token as a backup token and set the CRR initially at 1% (for greater volatility) and increase (over a year) to 10% to reduce volatility, which is important for FNTB tokens, as means of payment in the FinTab system.  What it gives to users  1. Token‚Äôs liquidity. Regardless of the volume of trading on the exchanges, there is always a possibility in the Bancor Network to exchange one smart-token for another, including a Bancor token. 2. There is no additional commission in the Bancor Network, only the gas price (Gas). 3. Additional financial security of the token. The backup token additionally supports the primary token (FNTB).

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: We are often asked we how we distinguish ourselves from Blockfolio service. Let‚Äôs analyze each service in details.   Blockfolio    Blockfolio is a popular mobile application for crypto-currency accounting for IOS and Android.  However, this service does not automatically transmit the information about transactions and the absence of web-version makes the manual data input inconvenient, especially with a large number of transactions and currencies.  Also, recently the users have been writing about service instability and frequent failures of the application.  Blockfolio is suitable only for personal use with a small number of currencies and transactions, but not for traders and cryptophones.   FinTab   In addition to the application, FinTab service includes a web-version and has a number of key benefits. There is no need to entry all data manually. With the help of secure integration through the API, the service automatically transmits the history of trading on exchanges.  FinTab uses a more advanced system to calculate the profitability of your portfolio, taking into account the various commissions and transactions such as input, withdrawal, currency exchange, etc. Also the service allows you to create an unlimited number of portfolios with the ability to provide access to other users, which is a good solution for professional traders and crypto funds.  Detailed analysis in the comparative table of services for crypto-currency accounting. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/14sIHtNYW99iZ8lf2Lfin_0sSfR1_xspjgCe38KclOOE/edit#gid=0  We have implemented already a significant part of the functionality in the existing beta version . And this means that the release version will have no equivalent!  You still have a chance to buy FinTab tokens. Hurry up to take part in the ICO and multiply your investments!

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: New Bonus from FinTab!  Since January 4, you stopped getting bonuses when buying tokens. But you often ask if you can get bonuses like any other way? And we came up with an excellent solution: tell your friends and subscribers why you bought FinTab tokens and get a bonus in proportion to the tokens number you purchased!  How does that work?  It's very simple ‚Äì you learned about our project from somewhere, you liked it and you decided to buy tokens. Now you of all people are interested in the project development! And the best way to help our project is to share your FinTab experience with your friends and subscribers and encourage them to become part. From our side we will make it worth ‚Äì give you bonus tokens for this. As a result, everybody wins and your friends find a good project in In the end, all is in the win, and your friends get a chance to learn about a good project.  How to do that?  1.   First you need to buy our tokens (the program is designed for those who have already bought tokens). 2.   Then fill out the form where you need to specify in which way you want to help the project: Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Medium, Steemit, Golos, Linkedin. You can choose one or more options. The bonus will be the same. We hope this will not be spam and you will choose the most popular social network for you. 3.   Write a post about your FinTab experience: tell why it is interesting for you, what makes it different from the other projects and why you decided to buy tokens. Don‚Äôt forget to provide a link to our website: https://fintab.io/ Also do not forget that it is possible to make a referral link in your personal account where you bought tokens (this is not necessary but if your friend buys tokens by clicking on this link, you will get another bonus from his purchase). 4.    Get your bonus tokens! You do not need to send any reports. We will verify the presence of posts from you. Bonus tokens will be sent to the address you specified during the initial purchase.  How much will I get?  Regardless of the number of social networks where you publish you post (we expect you are also interested in our service development); you will receive 50 FNT + 10% of the tokens you bought. For example, you buy 100 FNT, you get a bonus of 60 FNT. And think! If you bought 10,000 FNT, the bonus would be 1,050 FNT!  Nota bene! By writing in your social networks about our project, you will greatly help its development, and therefore yourself, as tokens‚Äô owners. Also your posts will help us to better understand what exactly attracts people to our project and improve it!   Registration form https://goo.gl/forms/FQVrELCquHIWhlBe2

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Team‚Äôs tokens  We are often asked: ‚ÄúHow many tokens are reserved for the team and how long will they be blocked for sale?‚Äù   The project team reserves 10% of the tokens from the total tokens‚Äô number. All unsold tokens will be destroyed, thus, the number of team‚Äôs tokens will also decrease. For example, if 5 million tokens (including Bounty) are sold during the ICO, 500,000 tokens will be allocated to the team.   The team‚Äôs tokens will be stored on a specific wallet (the address will be published later). The team tokens will be ‚Äúfrozen‚Äù (blocked for use) until 01.07.2018.   Go on asking your questions and sending your proposals and comments. This helps us to improve our service.   If you want to become part of our team or help the project ‚Äì don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us. We are always glad to new offers!

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: We are often asked: "Which rate do you take for a particular cryptocurrency?"  At the moment we are taking the average market rate of the cryptocurrency, similar to the rate on coinmarketcap.com. There is a problem now: the average market rate can differ by 5-15% of the exchange rate on a particular exchange. But we have already found a solution. At the end of January we will connect 60 top exchanges and in the future the value of your portfolio will be calculated in accordance with the exchanges rates where your cryptocurrency is located. At the same time, if the same coin is held on different exchanges, the rate will be calculated for the portfolio in general, taking into account the quantitative ratio of your assets between these exchanges.  Go on asking us any questions, sending you suggestions and comments. This help us to improve our service. https://t.me/fintab_chat_en

Body: Are there any reasons for the growth of FinTab tokens? Accordingly, the predicted starting point for the growth of the token rate will be the introduction of paid accounts in the system and the start of the tokens' burning.  Burning of tokens:   In FinTab system the burning of tokens that have entered the system as a service payment will be implemented:  - When paying for the service 10% of FNT tokens pass to FinTab team.  - The remaining 90% of the tokens are burned. Since 2012, Nikolay has worked at websites and Internet services developement, including the Telegram widget tgwidget.com. In 2014, he created a crypto-currency mining farm and organized a mining-pool. Since 2017 he is developing Android applications.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Which ICO to choose for investment?  According to statistics, the greatest profitability is made by projects that collect NOT large amounts on the ICO.  After all, if the project has collected several million dollars for an ICO even without a prototype, then the project needs to do something really incredible in order to increase its capitalization, in several times.  This year there was a boom in investment in block projects. The volume of investments amounted to more than $ 4 billion. Most projects enter the market without a prototype, they collect extremely large amounts under the guidance of non-experts in this field. All these factors together create a huge risk for investors.  Today Fintab is almost completed service, which will change the market of financial accounting for cryptocurrency. The project has already collected about $ 160,000, which indicates that the FinTab token has a very large margin for increasing its capitalization and, accordingly, a great chance to show very high interest rates.  You still have the opportunity to buy FinTabs tokens with a 10% bonus and join the project in the beginning!  Buy tokens: https://ico.fintab.io/Account/Register?lang=en

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: We are improving the smart contract FinTab  We are actively preparing for listing on exchanges, we have made technical and legal audit and were favorably evaluated. But at the same time, once again assessing the possibilities of the current smart contract, we came to the conclusion that FinTab needs a redeploy smart contract:  we are planning to implement the Bancor Protocol; it is necessary to take into account the new capabilities of the system; it is essential to improve the logic of the token.  Read ahead for more detailed information why we decided to do this, what are the consequences and how we will perform it.  Background  The current smart contract https://etherscan.io/token/0x9D613a7A10CD550C7a0826c6deEcFF6f1B3e9879 was deployed in October before pre-ICO started. Since then, we have significantly expanded the potential capabilities of the system and want to take them into account in a smart contract.   Moreover, we are planning to implement the Bancor Protocol and make a "smart token" to increase the liquidity of our token. Bancor Protocol is a promising technology that turns any token into a smart-token that will automatically trade or exchange for any other smart token without any further action from the author. This technology significantly increases the liquidity of the token and expands its capabilities. In the near future, we will prepare a detailed announcement.  Name of new token: FNTB  Automatic accrual of tokens  Current and future token holders should not worry about the issue of accruing the new tokens. This will happen automatically: each FNT token owner will automatically receive the corresponding FNTB amount for the corresponding wallet. At the time of calculating the tokens, the rate will be 1: 1, that is, 1 FNT = 1 FNTB.  The role of FNT and FNTB tokens   Role of FNT token: Participation in FinTab crowdsale. The garant to receive the FNTB token. The garant to receive the FNTB token.  Access to the notification system in the service https://beta.fintab.io   Role of the FNTB token: Access to the notification system in the service https://beta.fintab.io (before the ‚ÄúPro‚Äù account release). Payment for ‚ÄúPro‚Äù account in FinTab system. Payment for ‚ÄúManage‚Äù account in FinTab system. Other services and features listed in the WhitePaper and implemented depending on the collected funds on ICO FinTab.  After accruing FNTB tokens, FNT tokens will not be supported and used in FinTab system.   Thus, we will make our token even more technological, functional and liquid.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: FinTab: The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios  The crypto-currency market is chaotic nowadays: there are more than 1,300 coins (according to coinmarketcap.com statistics) and countless ICO tokens participating in trading on more than 300 stock exchanges and stored in different wallets. It is almost impossible to keep up with the constantly changing situation.  It becomes more and more difficult to quickly obtain an assessment of the current financial state, the yield on a particular currency, and the whole portfolio. This leads to the risk of making wrong investing decisions, serious losses or lost profits.  Almost each investor, trader and crypto-amateur sooner or later faces the problem of accounting his crypto-currency portfolio.  Read more: https://coinidol.com/fintab-accounting-system-for-cryptocurrency-portfolios/

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: We begin to get meeting with our advisors (consultants).  One of them is Alexander Rickers - private investor from Germany.   He is literally the first who believed in the FinTab project and invested in the pre-ICO stage. He began to deal with crypto-currencies with the purchase of Bitcoin in 2013. He is engaged in GPU-Mining of Litecoin and Feathercoin, building sixteen mining rigs for Litecoin and Feathercoin mining. He is involved in writing the scripts for the Cudaminer program for getting the best hashrates out of every graphic card. Started trading and investing at the end of 2016. Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: How is FinTab different from its competitors?  The free version of FinTab will have functions similar to CryptoCompare and Blockfolio. Moreover, it will offer: ‚Äî both desktop and mobile versions, which will be synchronized automatically; ‚Äî the accounting of ICO tokens (even the ones that are not issued yet); ‚Äî ability to add currencies that are not present in the market yet; ‚Äî ability to add custom exchanges and wallets; ‚Äî the buy / sell / exchange currency functions, as well as transferring between the exchanges; ‚Äî calculation of portfolio dynamics and its profit/loss and ROI considering multiple transactions* (replenishment, withdrawal, exchange); ‚Äî calculation of currency dynamics and its profit/loss considering multiple transactions* (replenishment, withdrawal, exchange); ‚Äî other standard functions (exchange rates, notifications, etc.)  *The example of multiple transactions: say you‚Äôve purchased a currency at one rate, sold it at another rate, purchased it again and sold it, traded it for another currency, etc. It becomes challenging to calculate the percentage of currency profitability, as well as the whole portfolio ROI. FinTab team has found the solution to this problem. Now you can always be sure to know your exact profit or loss (% or absolute value) on each currency or portfolio, no matter how many transactions you‚Äôve performed.  But those are not our main differences Our main point is our positioning. The service is intended for use by the following user categories:  Traders ‚Äî active users, working both on short and long positions. They perform numerous transactions and may have several active portfolios. Unlike the "Individual investors", traders perform series of transactions: several transactions within the same currency - purchase, exchange, transfer, withdrawal. They need to keep a record of these transactions and be able to see the overall statistics. Moreover, it is important to automate the addition of transactions.  Trusts ‚Äî in other words, traders who take third-party finance under management and supervise several clients. They need to be able to separate the agent and client accounts, and actively interact with the technical support for individual improvements. The agent account will feature the possibility of setting the client cabinet for each separate client: displaying the relevant information, placing a personal logo, generating a report, etc.  Here are the vital features that will be implemented for these types of users: ‚Äî the unlimited number of portfolios divided into public and private ones; ‚Äî personal cabinet with reports system and extended analytical tools; ‚Äî simple, yet powerfully protected integration with cryptocurrency exchanges via API for the automated transaction data transfer (in order to exclude the manual transaction input).  For trusts (traders managing multiple clients) the most important features will be: ‚Äî division into agency and client accounts**; ‚Äî personal technical support.  **Each client‚Äôs individual portfolio access. You can set up the information you wish to display to each separate client. At the same time, unlike the ordinary portfolios, the client accounts are automatically synchronized with the agency accounts, thus, performing any transactions in your agency account you won‚Äôt need to manually duplicate them in your client‚Äôs account.

Author: sibnia
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Our basic principle is to make the service for people. We take into account what is really necessary and important for each audience.  *Private investors Private investors don't need an overloaded system which is more difficult for understanding than cryptocurrencies. The investor does not care how much the currency has grown; the only thing that matters is how much he has earned and how he can earn more. At the same time, not all users know the basics of trading and they need recommendations.  *Traders For traders the maximum automation is required not to waste their time on accounting and analytics. Traders make transactions on the various exchanges (because of the rate difference) and financial accounting becomes a very laborious task. If the trader takes the finance under management he needs to report to the clients to make it as clear and simple as possible not wasting much time. And it is extremely significant for traders to understand their efficiency. All the traders strive to create the most effective and attractive portfolio to obtain more portfolios under management.  *Funds For funds it is needed to reduce the routine processing of huge transaction flows from their customers. It is important to decrease the complexity of maintaining internal accounting and improve its accuracy. And for clients as for investors the most important thing is to understand how much they have earned.  At the same time, funds need this kind of service in any case but in-house solution is costly and requires labor and temporary resources.

Author: Alex Melkov
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: "We did not limit ourselves to only cryptocurrency portfolios accounting service. FinTab is an analytical system based on the financial accounting service for cryptocurrency but in addition there are other interactions that perfectly complement our system. We are already developing our database of transactions on exchanges, historical exchange rates. In addition, we want to develop a tracking algorithm for each coin which will be evaluated by a set of indicators. The result of the algorithm will be the signals and recommendations generation for working with a particular coin. Each user of FinTab system will be able to get free access to the basic analytics and to a deeper analysis and recommendations ‚Äì for FNT tokens. In the future we are planning to implement an artificial intelligence (AI) system that will give recommendations, taking into account the activity and preferences of the user with a more likely prediction." This is a text from white paper. You can get acquainted more closely, on the site https://fintab.io there are all the documents

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: We are glad to announce that pre-ICO has been successfully completed! We raised $ 78,363, closing the Soft Cap by 124%.  Thanks to all participants! Your support at the early stage is extremely important for us. Thanks to you we will be able to make the best service.  This week we will make an announcement of all the changes, we have worked out the ideas of new features of the system: - P2P interactions between users: traders will be able to sell information about their crypto-portfolios through our system. In addition the rating of the best traders will be compiled. - Advertising platform. Placement and display of advertising will be held in a decentralized form; each user can disable or enable the advertising. For the ads view the user obtains tokens from the advertisers. - Analytical system and recommendations for trade with the use of AI.  We remind you that the main purpose of FNT tokens is to pay for the service. The service helps to keep a record of the crypto-currency, analyze the current financial state on various exchanges and purses.  Start of the main stage of ICO: December, 14 End: January, 14 Additional closed stage of sales (pre-sale): December, 10-13 We will make an announcement of the bounty-program in the near future.  We had to postpone the ICO date for 2 weeks: we are interested in making our ICO successful. We want to carefully prepare and make ICO as attractive for investors as possible. We will make the best service for the financial accounting of the crypto-currency.  We are already negotiating with the exchanges for tokens to enter the market after ICO Participate in beta-testing of the service; your feedback is very important for us https://beta.fintab.io/ If any questions ask Grigory on Telegram: @grigory_gm (https://t.me/grigory_gm)

In addition the rating of the best traders will be compiled. ‚Äî Advertising platform. For the ads view the user obtains tokens from the advertisers. ‚Äî Analytical system and recommendations for trade with the use of AI.  Next week we will make the announcement of the updated WhitePaper, where these ideas will be detailed.  https://youtu.be/18axWYiihTg There are subtitles in English.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios  The basic principle is that we are doing the service for people. We take into account what is really necessary and important for every audience.  Private investors Private investors don't need an overloaded system which is more difficult for understanding than cryptocurrencies.  The investor does not care how much the currency has grown; the only thing that matters is how much he has earned and how he can earn more. At the same time, not all users know the basics of trading and they need recommendations.  Traders For traders the maximum automation is required not to waste their time on accounting and analytics. Traders make transactions on various exchanges (because of the rate difference) and financial accounting becomes a very laborious task.  If the trader takes the finance under management he needs to report to the clients to make it clear and simple as possible not wasting much time. And it is extremely significant for traders to understand their efficiency. All the traders strive to create the most effective and attractive portfolio to obtain more portfolios under management.  Funds For funds it is needed to reduce the routine processing of huge transaction flows from their customers. It is important to decrease the complexity of maintaining internal accounting and improve its accuracy. And for clients as for investors the most important thing is to understand how much they have earned.  At the same time, for funds need this kind of service in any case but in-house solution is costly and requires labor and temporary resources.    Beta-version  Web-version                                                                                  Mobile app    Ecosystem FinTab FinTab is an analytical system based on the financial accounting service for cryptocurrency but in addition there are other interactions that perfectly complement our system.   Service FinTab is a SaaS product with paid services. The cost for the service for the "Pro" and "Manage" accounts will be fixed in USD, but payment is accepted in FinTab tokens (FNT).  P2P interaction P2P interaction: traders could sell the information about their crypto-portfolio through our system. In addition the rating of best traders will be compiled.  Advertising platform Advertising platform: placement and display of advertising will be held decentralized: each user can enable or disable ads. For the ads view the user obtains tokens from the advertisers.  System of signals Analytical system and recommendations for trade using Artificial Intelligence.     System development Depending on the collected funds FinTab will implement the following features:     Issue and Sales of the FNT Tokens We have estimated the number of our potential users by the third quarter of 2018. Based on this we have calculated how many tokens we can issue. The calculation formula can be found in WhitePaper. A total of 16.5 million FinTab tokens (FNT) will be issued: ‚Äî 14 million FNT will be sold out in total during all the ICO stages for system development. ‚Äî 1.5 million FNT reserved for the team and partners. ‚Äî 1 million FNT reserved as a reward for helping the project (bounty).      The reasons for FinTab tokens growth Return on investment is based on a constant increase of FNT token rate: ‚Äî The demand for the service grows due to the constant promotion and development of the functionality. ‚Äî The burning of token ensures the deficit and the increase of token cost. ‚Äî Advertising functionality increases the demand and turnover of tokens.  Accordingly, the predicted starting point for the growth of the token rate will be the introduction of paid accounts in the system and the start of the tokens' burning.   Burning of tokens  In FinTab system the burning of tokens that have entered the system as a service payment will be implemented: ‚Äî When paying for the service 10% of FNT tokens pass to FinTab team. ‚Äî The remaining 90% of the tokens are burned. When using FinTab as an advertising and P2P platform, tokens are not burned (since 90% of the tokens are given to users and the remaining 10% to FinTab team).     RoadMap     Meet the Team  Mikhail Fadeev, CEO. Since 2010, Mikhail is engaged in web-development. He has created and launched a number of projects, including the Merit onine agency, an agency for the implementation of CRM-systems and a web studio. He is engaged in trading and has funds under management. "For me, blockchain is a philosophy that is already changing the world"  Grigory Maltsev, COO. The co-founder of the Merit onine agency, the head of the web studio development department in 2016, the project manager in a design studio (Yandex projects) in 2015, the Internet marketer since 2012. Grigory created a financial accounting system for an Internet agency, participated in the development of the Basecamp application.  Nikolay Ozhogov, CTO. Full-stack programmer. Since 2012, Nikolay has worked at websites and Internet services developement, including the Telegram widget tgwidget.com. In 2014, he created a crypto-currency mining farm and organized a mining-pool. Since 2017 he is developing Android applications.   Dmitry Motorin, the head of the mobile development team. He has been working in information technology since 2002 and in mobile development since 2012. Dmitry has to his credit more than a hundred released mobile applications for Android and iOS, being repeatedly selected as the recommended apps and obtaining the best positions in the stores in the most competitive subjects. Also he‚Äôs a crypto enthusiast since 2014, having several own cryptocurrency mining farms.  Vadim Kirei, mobile app developer. Programmer. He has created one of the leading applications for forex traders. Vadim is engaged in Android and iOS applications development for blockchain startups. He has more than 10 released projects, 3 of which are associated with blockchain. An average score for his applications in stores is 4.6.  Stas Bondarenko, lead designer. Stanislav goes in for UI product design. He has experience in developing CRM systems, interfaces and materials from the gaming industry and retail. He has been working as an art director for more than 5 years and more than 8 years as a lead designer of the product. He has become a fan of technology blockbuster during an internship at SalesForce in San Francisco.  Ivan Teslenko, Russian-English interpreter. 10 years of experience in the field of translations. Previously was engaged in website localization and translation of news, videos and webinars. Active crypto enthusiast.  Hokumdar Gasanov, video editing and promotion. He has been working with several small and large companies, such as MEDIAMETRIKS, OSMAN GROUP, has promoted DAN and travel agency SHAN TOURS.  Ilya Konovalov, media manager. Since 2017 he worked as an Internet marketer in the Internet agency Merit: he was engaged in advertising and promotion of sites and Internet resources.  Anton Andreev, traffic manager. Specialist in marketing, advertising and PR. In 2017, he was engaged in traffic arbitration in the 8bit group. Since 2013 he worked in AIESEC: organization and promotion of events.     Community  EN   RU     Official translations Pycc–∫–∏–π

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Weekly news digest. 03.11   New contacts  Mikhail has arrived back from Moscow, the trip was very useful: ‚ÄúWhen I returned back from Moscow I decided to go back there. In Moscow we had meetings with funds, KickICO and visited a conference - Russian Blockchain Week 2017. On 15 november we are going to Moscow again where we will have a stand together with STARTICO‚Äù  Performance in Ekaterinburg  A conference was held on 2 November where Grigory made a speech: what is the ICO and how to tell the difference between a good project from a bad one. Well, the activity in Ekaterinburg is not the same as in Moscow but it is in our hands.    Service news  This week has been very productive: we finished tuning all the algorithms, added guest access by link(with functional only for reading), allowed to demonstrate investments portfolio and return on investments by an easy way. We have already integrated 2 exchanges: Poloniex and Bittrex. And other sorts of staff which you may not see but they definitely make our service easier and better.  Mobile App  Right now we are fixing errors which we have found and in November you could see updated design and functionality. You can observe the progress of development in our task manager Trello.   Closest plans  We started working out the ‚ÄúPro‚Äù account in FinTab system. In particular, integration of the exchanges. We would like to provide the system which would be convenient and useful for everybody so we suggest taking an active part in testing and support us with the feedback.  [size=0pt]Teaser[/size]  Last couple of weeks we have been developing the conception of the project, and next week we will announce new cool ideas which will make our project even more interesting.    At this moment we have already raised  and we are waiting for the $10,000 payment which will finally get the Soft Cap. There are only 8 days before the closing the pre-ICO - hurry up with your investments! The development is well under way and you are already able to test our service!

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: FinTab Reaches a New Level  FinTab is a prospective accounting system for cryptocurrency portfolios. FinTab allows you to quickly evaluate the current state of your funds, the profitability of a particular currency and of your entire portfolio. A distinctive feature of the project is its clear positioning: FinTab creates the system in accordance with the needs of traders and trusts.     Thanks to a deep elaboration of the stages of project development and optimization of the expenses, FinTab has the opportunity to set realistic goals. Successful independent launch of the pre-ICO, despite the absence of speculative early investments, which have already become a ‚Äústandard‚Äù for ICO projects, has benefited in more than 50 percent of the expected amount of investments in the very first hours, and it clearly demonstrates the relevance and potential of the project.    The potential of the project and its relevance is confirmed by rising attention from other blockchain projects in this segment, including large ones. On October 20, right after the successful start of the pre-ICO, Mikhail Fadeev (FinTab CEO) signed a cooperation agreement with Alexei Vuiko, a representative of iCrypto SA, which is currently working on the creation of Datarius ‚Äì the first social p2p crypto bank.   At the bilateral meeting in Kiev (Ukraine), the partners discussed various options for integration on parity terms, which would have a positive impact on the liquidity of FNT tokens in the future. Mikhail and Alexei evaluated the potential for joint cooperation, and outlined a plan for further consultations.  Datarius' principles of work are based on transparency, openness, independence, globality and social orientation, which fully comply with the principles of FinTab - and this was the key factor in making this decision.  Moreover, the FinTab team is actively engaged in core events. Since the launch of the pre-ICO, the project representatives managed to speak at two conferences and already received invitations for several major events.  Why FinTab receives so much attention and provokes interest?  Firstly, this is one of the rare cases when a team is able to demonstrate a working product at the stage of pre-ICO. To date, the service is at the beta stage and has an Android mobile app, but it‚Äôs already understandable that the project is about to evolve and become a leader within its market. Secondly, the project is of investment attractiveness for users. Clear and simple service monetization and token burning system provide the prospects for the FNT rate growth. More details can be found on the FinTab website and WhitePaper   Plus, pre-ICO bonus conditions are excellent: 75% discount compared to the price at the main stage of the ICO.   And thirdly, FinTab technology has a perspective not only in B2C sector, but in B2B as well. And this brings the project to a whole new level. We can assume that the contract with Datarius is just the beginning. The project will be of interest to numerous cryptocurrency funds and financial systems.  Official FinTab website: https://fintab.io

Author: Start ICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: We made some different logic of payments for tokens in this case because of security and convenience reasons: 1: We want to avoind situations like DAO or CoinDash and many other ICOs, where smart contacts were hacked and money/tokens were lost. So payments go to addresses which are not connected with cointracts directly, but investros always see all transacrions in their personal account and all token transfers from smart contract to their wallets. 2. StartICO team provide some escrow functions about investro's money and smart contract will recieve money/tokens back only after ICO will end. 3. We want to provide the opportunity to make investments not only in ETH, but also in BTC other altcoins and Fiat money on legal field. Unfortunately smart contracts can react only on ETH... and we decided to use this solution.  Anyway only one smart contract of FNT token with address 0x9D613a7A10CD550C7a0826c6deEcFF6f1B3e9879 is declared and FinTab team as public persons are under an obligations with only this token.  Be confident that this investments has no payment or recieveing token risk.

Author: dc_lose
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Why return tokens to the market?

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: If we don‚Äôt return tokens to the market, their quantity will constantly decrease, which will eventually lead to the deficit and the FinTab service will become extremely expensive (the token value will drastically increase). We‚Äôve considered an option of returning the tokens by reselling them, but it would make us the regulators of the token value, which contradicts the ideology of blockchain. In other words, we want our service‚Äôs price to be regulated by the market itself.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Where does the 10 million number come from? To reach such number, we would need to sell out absolutely all the tokens (to take the Hard cap), without bonuses (during the 3rd and 4th weeks of the ICO, without selling anything at all in the first 2 weeks). The real number is the Soft cap. As for now, the Soft cap is 15 million FNT, but will most likely be reduced to 10 million FNT. 10 million FNT equals $3.4 million (taking into account the fact that people will buy tokens during the whole period of 4 weeks, that is, including the bonus accruals).  The team will receive only 10% of the tokens paid for the service, the remaining 90% will return to the market as dividends (see the WhitePaper, "Issue and sale of FNT tokens" section). Thus, the core funds for development, promotion and remuneration for 2018 will be formed during the ICO. Starting from 2019, the number of users must become sufficient, so that 10% will be enough for the full maintenance and development of the system.  ICO budget distribution (sorted irrelative of the expenditure): ‚Äî Promotion of the service: we need to attract 300,000 users by the third quarter of 2018. ‚Äî Mobile application development for iOS. ‚Äî Elaboration of the ‚ÄòManage‚Äô accounts functionality. ‚Äî Development of our own API for currency rates, ICO tokens and their historical values. ‚Äî Development of our own blockchain for processing and storing the user transactions database. ‚Äî Formation of the 24/7 support service. ‚Äî Server and administration costs. ‚Äî Security and safety systems: all user data will be completely safe, even the FinTab team will not have the access to it. By decentralizing the storage and processing of the database (by the means of blockchain) we will in fact eliminate the chance of losing or hacking the data. ‚Äî Legal registration of the company.  Salary for: ‚Äî The team of developers (about 15-20 people). ‚Äî Promotion Department (pr, marketing, community support - about 10 people). ‚Äî Technical support team (5-6 people).  Profit of the company. In our case, ICO is not just some sort of crowdfunding, but the way of selling the tokens for "Pro" and "Manage" accounts‚Äô payments (of which we will only receive 10%). All that goes beyond the stated costs is the company's profit for 2018.  That is why FinTab is not just a service, but the accounting system for crypto-currency portfolios. One of the main problems of existing services is that they do not have enough resources for development. That's why we decided to have the ICO in order to make a cool, working service - the system that will be used by funds and traders - and maintain it at the highest level.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Great news. We cancel dividends and burn tokens. Later we will write more about this.

Author: FinTab
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FinTab ‚Äì The Accounting System for Cryptocurrency Portfolios
Body: Important changes in the project Despite the fact that pre-ICO will be held on October 12, we decided to make fundamentally important changes in the project.  Burning of tokens We decided to abandon the dividend system (charging tokens to investors, to return to the market) in favor of  burning of tokens. How the smart contract will work when you pay for the service: Every month (the first day) 10% of FNT tokens entered from the users (as a payment for the service) go to the FinTab team. The remaining 90% of FNT tokens entering the system as payment for the service will be burned every month (first day). * Exposure per month is needed to reduce gas costs when transferring tokens.  The reason why we switched to the system of burning of tokens Legal aspect of the system. Using the dividend system, we came under the control of such regulators as the SEC. Burning of  tokens allows you to expand the geography of the service. Legal aspect of users. Dividends are treated as a certain income over a period of time. Accordingly, for investors this may become an additional taxation. Technical aspect. Payments should be made to investors who have more than 2500 FNT on their account. But what if these funds were transferred to the stock exchange, to several purses / exchanges? Because of this, there could be problems with accruals or their complete absence. Economic aspect. With a significant number of investors, the cost of transferring tokens could reach very high values.  Investors' interest Burning of tokens will lead to an increase in the deficit of tokens, especially given the constant growth of users. Thus, we can predict a more rapid growth of the token rate (than in the case of dividends).  Users' Interest To ensure that the deficit of tokens does not lead to a sharp rise in the cost of the service, we fix the cost of the service in USD: ‚Äî "Pro" account ‚Äî $19/month ‚Äî "Manage" account ‚Äî $95/month  Payment is also accepted only in FNT tokens. With the growth of the FNT rate, the cost of service in tokens will decrease, remaining fixed in USD. Moreover, with the increase in the cost of the token, you can save a lot on using the service if you buy in advance (on pre-ICO or ICO) FNT tokens.  Issue of tokens Switching to the system of burning tokens and a fixed price in USD also allowed solving the problem of the future uncontrolled growth of the cost of the service. In this regard, we decided to reduce the number of tokens produced by 5,000,000.  1. Pre-ICO (12 October - 12 November 2017). At the Pre-ICO stage, 2 million FNTs will be put on the market. Cost of 1 FNT = $ 0.1 Soft Cap - $ 63,000 Hard Cap - $ 200,000  2. ICO (December 2017). At the ICO stage, 21 million FNTs will be put on the market. Cost of 1 FNT = $ 0.4 Soft Cap - sold 8 million FNT Hard Cap - sold 21 (+3 in case of sale of reserve) Million FNT At the ICO the following system of bonuses will operate: ‚Äî In the first 48h + 30% of tokens. ‚Äî In the next 5 days + 20% of tokens. ‚Äî In the second week + 10% of tokens. ‚Äî In the third week + 5% of tokens. ‚Äî In the fourth week bonus accruals are not made. If all tokens are sold out within the first 3 weeks after the start of the ICO, a reserve fund will be used. Otherwise, tokens from the reserve fund will be destroyed. After the fourth week, the sale of tokens ceases. All unsold tokens will be destroyed.  Conclusion Switching to the system of burning of tokens and fixing the cost of the service in USD: Preserves investment attractiveness (and even increases in the long term). Provides a fixed transparent cost for users, despite the growth of the token rate. Solves the legal issue. Simplifies and makes more reliable technical implementation.
